Hi! my name is Scout. I’m a passionate wordsmith excited to share my expertise for communication and marketing. 

I believe communication and marketing should live in a harmonious balance between science and art. Data and research drives informed decisions while use of color and well written taglines serve to capture attention. I seek to strike this balance by utilizing the following:

● Highly-proficient project management skills provide the ability to utilize data and creative thinking to make well
informed decisions.

● Problem solving at the micro- and macro- levels

● Clear communication, active listening, and a willingness to work through healthy-tension.

Hi! my name is Scout. I’m a passionate wordsmith excited to share my expertise for communication and marketing.

I believe communication and marketing should live in a harmonious balance between science and art. Data and research drives informed decisions while use of color and well written taglines serve to capture attention. I seek to strike this balance by utilizing the following:

● Highly-proficient project management skills provide the ability to utilize data and creative thinking to make well informed decisions.

I spearheaded the marketing initiatives for admissions at Catholic Central High School, focusing on enhancing enrollment and raising awareness. Collaborating closely with a marketing agency, I developed and executed a comprehensive digital marketing strategy encompassing search, display and video ads, geo-fencing, social media campaigns, and re-marketing efforts.

Additionally, I played a key role in crafting engaging content and visuals for the data-driven landing page utilized in our digital marketing efforts. Effectively managing and overseeing the departmental budget, I ensured the efficient allocation of resources and the implementation of cost-effective strategies to achieve project objectives.

Beyond digital efforts, my marketing plan featured targeted direct mailers, a well-structured yearly social media posting calendar, as well as the creation of both print and digital brochures, among other strategies.

During the 2022-2023 period, I collaborated with Catholic Central High School's advancement team to develop a comprehensive marketing plan and materials for their $15M comprehensive campaign. Beginning with consultations with the school's board chair and president, I played a key role in establishing the campaign name and outline for content requirements. Subsequently, I formulated a marketing plan incorporating targeted emails, strategic social media posts, geo-fencing strategies, and a media approach.

In addition to the strategic planning, I collaborated with the design team to produce essential campaign materials such as the campaign logo, brochure, social media templates, and more. The following examples showcase the quality and diversity of the materials crafted for the campaign:

I initiated and project-managed a comprehensive rebranding effort for Catholic Central High School. The primary goal was to elevate the established brand to mirror the sophistication of college-level materials. Collaborating closely with the design team, we crafted materials for print, digital ads, billboards, videos, and more. This rebranding endeavor also encompassed a complete overhaul of the school's website. Here are examples showcasing the transformed and upgraded materials resulting from this rebranding initiative:
